Package Model

Class Crack

java.lang.Object
Model.Crack
public class Crack
extends java.lang.Object
This is Crack class. Draw crack and perform crack operations.
Since:
24 November 2021
Version:
0.2
Author:
Chin Hong Shen

  • Constructor Details

    • Crack

      public Crack​(Brick brick, int crackDepth, int steps)
      This is Crack class constructor. Create a crack object. Initialises variables and perform instantiation.
      Parameters:
      brick - represents brick class
      crackDepth - the value of crack depth
      steps - represents steps taken to break all the bricks

  • Method Details

    • makeCrack

      protected void makeCrack​(java.awt.geom.Point2D point, int direction)
      This method is used to find the starting and ending point of the crack. The ball contact with the wall in different directions will cause the crack to have different directions.
      Parameters:
      point - defines a point representing a location in (x,y) coordinate space
      direction - represents the direction of the brick crack
      See Also:
      makeRandomPoint(Point, Point, int)

    • makeCrack

      protected void makeCrack​(java.awt.Point start, java.awt.Point end)
      This method is used to draw the crack.
      Parameters:
      start - represents starting point of the crack
      end - represents the ending point of the crack

    • randomInBounds

      private int randomInBounds​(int bound)
      This method is used to set random value to change y-coordinate of the crack.
      Parameters:
      bound - a value contributes to make the random value
      Returns:
      a random value

    • makeRandomPoint

      private java.awt.Point makeRandomPoint​(java.awt.Point from, java.awt.Point to, int direction)
      This method is used to make random starting and ending point of the crack.
      Parameters:
      from - represents the starting point of the crack
      to - represents the ending point of the crack
      direction - represents horizontal or vertical direction
      Returns:
      a crack point with (x,y) coordinate

    • draw

      public java.awt.geom.GeneralPath draw()
      This method is used to display the crack on the game window
      Returns:
      a geometric path constructed from the crack

    • reset

      public void reset()
      This is to recover the brick from crack.
